tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RoutingAndDeliverySchedules ( 
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    route_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    delivery_schedule VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    delivery_vehicle VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    delivery_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE Routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    origin_location VARCHAR,
    destination_location VARCHAR,
    distance_in_km FLOAT,
    estimated_time_hours FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DeliverySchedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT REFERENCES Routes(route_id),
    delivery_date DATE,
    delivery_time TIME,
    vehicle_id INT,
    driver_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE RoutingSchedule (
    route_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    end_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    distance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE DeliverySchedule (
    delivery_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT REFERENCES RoutingSchedule(route_id),
    delivery_date DATE NOT NULL,
    delivery_time TIME NOT NULL,
    estimated_time DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE routing_schedule (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_location VARCHAR(50),
  end_location VARCHAR(50),
  distance_km FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_schedule (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  delivery_date DATE,
  delivery_time TIME,
  delivery_status VARCHAR(20),
  route_id INT REFERENCES routing_schedule(route_id)
)

CREATE TABLE driver_schedule (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(50),
  driver_license_number VARCHAR(20),
  driver_phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_schedule (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_number VARCHAR(20),
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(20),
  driver_id INT REFERENCES driver_schedule(driver_id)
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  origin_city VARCHAR(50),
  destination_city VARCHAR(50),
  distance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_schedule (
  delivery_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id UUID REFERENCES routes(route_id),
  delivery_time TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  capacity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE shipments (
  shipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  delivery_id UUID REFERENCES delivery_schedule(delivery_id),
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE drivers (
  driver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
)
